channel.title: Comments on: Predictions
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: I'm really excited about Pan's Labyrinth and 300. Labyrinth looks really creepy, and the last stand of those 300 Spartans has always stoked the latent soldier in me.
item.content:encoded: I’m really excited about Pan’s Labyrinth and 300. Labyrinth looks really creepy, and the last stand of those 300 Spartans has always stoked the latent soldier in me.
